text: It matches by the ID field
You can see how by exporting a table with foreign ID fields

One of our clients wants to create a password protected site and provide profiles of many companies to subscribers. I understand we can do that in HubSpot. But they want to provide a newsfeed once someone subscribes where the subscriber can have a portal/newsfeed where they can add their favorite profiles. Is that possible in HubSpot?

a membership based site is not possible without being in the membership beta, and functionality in that beta may still be limited <@U22PNRAJD> may be able to get you into the beta and explain what it enables you to do

Hi <@UBRTKP4D8> we do have a memberships tool out in production for Marketing Enterprise level customers but looking into the specific use case you've mentioned here, I don't know that it will fully solve for your client's needs.  I'm going to follow up with you via DM to dig in further.
Maybe check out <https://w.inboundlabs.co/booya> to see if this might work <@UBRTKP4D8>
